items.content: Curated rituals and professional treatments for your complete wellness

items.title: Head Spa
items.description: Curated rituals to deeply relax, detoxify, and revive your scalp, skin, and senses â€” like a holiday for your whole being.

items.title: Waxing
items.description: Instant smoothness with professional waxing for both men and women. Removes hair from the root, leaving skin clean, soft, and refreshed.

items.title: Laser Hair Removal
items.description: Advanced laser technology for long-lasting hair reduction. Safe, effective, and visibly smoother skin from the very first session.

items.title: Eyelash Extension Menu
items.description: Enhance your eyes with custom lash styles crafted to flatter your unique beauty. All lashes are applied by certified lash artists using premium materials and gentle adhesive.

items.title: Premium Products
items.description: We use only the finest organic and natural beauty products for all treatments.

items.title: Caring Approach
items.description: Our experienced therapists provide personalized care tailored to your needs.

items.title: Safe & Hygienic
items.description: Maintaining the highest standards of cleanliness and safety protocols.

items.content: Sourced from nature's finest treasures around the world

items.name: White Truffle Extract
items.benefit: Rich in fatty acids and vitamins, it deeply restores damaged hair and enhances unparalleled shine.

items.name: Caviar Extract
items.benefit: Packed with Omega-3, proteins, and minerals; regenerates hair from within and combats scalp aging.

items.name: Pearl Powder
items.benefit: Infuses hair with minerals, purifies the scalp, and imparts a luminous, silky gloss.

items.name: 24K Gold Infusion
items.benefit: Boosts circulation, delivers powerful antioxidants, and leaves hair and scalp with a radiant glow.

items.name: Saffron
items.benefit: Known as 'red gold,' it soothes sensitive scalps while nourishing hair with potent antioxidants.

items.name: Camellia Oil
items.benefit: Japan's beauty secret, rich in oleic acid; absorbs quickly to soften and smooth hair like silk.

items.name: Premium Seaweed Complex (Kombu, Wakame)
items.benefit: Provides marine minerals, restores hydration balance, and revitalizes weakened strands.

items.name: Royal Jelly
items.benefit: A superfood for the scalp, abundant in proteins and B vitamins; strengthens and reduces breakage.

items.name: Japanese Hinoki Essential Oil
items.benefit: Distilled from sacred cypress wood; deeply cleanses, purifies, and offers a calming, spa-like aroma.

items.name: Placenta Extract (Botanical / Biotech)
items.benefit: Supports cell regeneration, revitalizes follicles, and promotes denser, healthier hair growth.

items.content: Highly trained specialists dedicated to your wellness

items.name: Kris
items.description: Trained in advanced lash artistry and Japanese scalp therapy, Kris delivers flawless lash designs and deeply restorative head spa treatments. Her expertise ensures every guest enjoys both beauty and true relaxation.

items.name: Rose
items.description: Specialized in scalp therapy and advanced laser hair removal, Rose combines technical expertise with a caring touch. She helps clients achieve both deep relaxation and long-lasting smoothness with confidence.

items.name: Shina
items.role: Head Spa, Laser, Waxing & Massage Therapist
items.description: With multi-disciplinary training in spa wellness, Shina offers everything from rejuvenating head spa rituals to precise waxing and soothing massage. Her versatility makes every treatment tailored and complete.

items.name: Lina
items.description: Lina is skilled in combining effective hair removal with scalp relaxation therapies. Detail-oriented and gentle, she ensures clients leave with both refreshed skin and a calm mind.

items.name: Mei Ling
items.description: With years of hands-on experience across all beauty and wellness services, Mei Ling now leads Diora Spa as Manager. Her deep expertise, professionalism, and passion for client care ensure the highest standards across every treatment.
